source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_document_metadata

AS

SELECT DISTINCT 
MD.DataId	                AS	documentId,
MD.CaseNodeId	            AS	caseId,
MD.caseReference	        AS	caseReference,
MD.documentReference	    AS	documentReference,
MD.Version	                AS	version,
AMD.examinationRefNo	    AS	examinationRefNo,
MD.Name	                    AS	filename,
MD.Name	                    AS	originalFilename,
MD.DataSize	                AS	size,
AMD.mime	                AS	mime,
AMD.documentUri	            AS	documentUri,
AMD.documentUri		        AS	publishedDocumentUri,
AMD.virusCheckStatus	    AS	virusCheckStatus,
AMD.fileMd5	                AS	fileMd5,
MD.CreateDate	            AS	dateCreated,
MD.ModifyDate	            AS	lastModified,
MD.CaseworkType	            AS	caseType,
AMD.redactedStatus	        AS	redactedStatus,
MD.PublishedStatus	        AS	publishedStatus,
MD.DatePublished	        AS	datePublished,
MD.DocumentType	            AS	documentType,
AMD.securityClassification	AS	securityClassification,
MD.SourceSystem	            AS	sourceSystem,
AMD.origin                  AS	origin,
AMD.owner                   AS	owner,
MD.Author	                AS	author,
MD.Representative	        AS	representative,
MD.DocumentDescription	    AS	description,
MD.DocumentCaseStage	    AS	documentCaseStage,
MD.Filter1	                AS	filter1,
MD.Filter2	                AS	filter2,
MD.ParentID	                AS	horizonFolderId,
'NULL'	                    AS	transcriptId	

FROM odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data   AS MD
JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data    AS AMD
    ON MD.DataID = AMD.DocumentID
WHERE AMD.IsActive = 'Y' 
    AND MD.IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.document_meta_data

USING delta

AS

SELECT 
* 
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_document_metadata
